_header: A wale white as whales bone
_description: A Lover’s Torments — fifty-five lines in 6-line stanzas, reconstructed as eight 6-line stanzas with 5-line refrain

BLHar2253.First Lines:
A wayle whyt ase whalles bonA grein in golde þat godly
                    shon…
BLHar2253.Last Lines: …Bituene hire curtel ant hire smokY wolde ben hy
BLHar2253.Note: Written as prose with virgules marking line breaks.
